snippet.body: <button class="${1}" size="${2:default}" type="${1:default}" plain="${2:false}" disabled="${3:false}" loading="${4:false}" hover-class="${5:button-hover}" hover-stop-propagation="${6:false}" ${7: form-type="submit|reset"} ${8:open-type="contact|share|getUserInfo|openSetting|feedback"} > ${9} </button>
